rules.description: Alfred, Finder & Marta, PDF Reader Pro, WezTerm & Alacritty
Lft ⇧ / Lft ⇧ + MOD → Switch Input Method

MOD ` → ~, MOD A → AeroSpace App Mode, MOD E → Aerospace Expand Mode, MOD F → Make Window Float, MOD H/J/K/L → Focus on Window, MOD N/P → Previous / Next Workspace, MOD S → Aerospace Space Mode, MOD T → Make Window on Top, MOD V → Move / Resize Window, MOD ⇥ → Last Workspace, MOD '/\ → Toggle Layout Tiling / Accordion, MOD⇧ H/J/K/L → Swap Window, MOD ␣ → AeroSpace Mode
⇪⌘ B → Bob, ⇪⌘ D → Define, ⇪⌘ E → DeHelper, ⇪⌘ F → Fantastical, ⇪⌘ G → Autojump, ⇪⌘ H/L → Prev/Next Tab, ⇪⌘ M → Menu Bar Search, ⇪⌘ P → ChatGPT, ⇪⌘ R → Alfred Recent Path, ⇪ ⇥ → List Windows
✧ A → Launch Alfred, ✧ C → Merge Clipboard, ✧ D → Download, ✧ R → Reload Hammerspoon, ✧ S → Screenshot, ✧ V → Paste Plaintext, ✧ W → Close Without Save
Thumb H/J/K/L → Navigation, Thumb \ → ↵, Thumb Digits → Fn Keys, Thumb 􀄦/􀄧 → Volume Up / Down

Hold ␣ B → Bitwarden, Hold ␣ J/K → Scroll ↑/↓, Hold ␣ M → Mailbox, Hold ␣ N → Mailbox Check New, Hold ␣ O → Obsidian Vault, Hold ␣ P → Podcasts, Hold ␣ T → Today, Hold ␣ X → Manage Tmux, Hold ␣ \ → Control Center
⇪ → ⎋ / ⌃, Hold ⇪ → ✧, ⇪ ~ → Home Dir in Alfred, ↵ ⌫ → ⌦, Hold ⎋ → Force Quit, jh → Vim Mode

to.shell_command: pgrep -xq AeroSpace && /opt/homebrew/bin/aerospace enable toggle || open -a AeroSpace

rules.description: Alfred with Selection/ Clipboard/ Actions, Hold 􀆪 → Show Alfred
Alfred Clipboard Manager, Lft⌘ C A/S/D/F → Copy Clip
